312440513.Title: LG Electronics 7.4 cu. ft. Ultra Large White Smart Gas Vented Dryer with Sensor Dry, TurboSteam & Wi-Fi Enabled
312440513.Description: Meet the intelligent dryer that helps you save time and enhances fabric care, all at the same time. TurboSteam technology reduces wrinkles and odors in up to 5 garments to refresh clothes in between washes. Built-in intelligence automatically selects the right drying motions, temperatures and more, and even talks to your washer to select a compatible cycle-making it the ultimate laundry hack. You'll even score high on the durability and style scale, thanks to the scratch-resistant tempered glass door and rose gold accents. Color: White.

308089259.Title: Whirlpool 7.4 cu. ft. 120-Volt Black Shadow Stackable Smart Gas Vented Dryer with Remote Start, ENERGY STAR
308089259.Description: Stay in control and connected from anywhere with a smart front load dryer and the Whirlpool® app.* It includes a dryer rack that attaches inside the stainless steel drum for tumble-free drying of bulky or delicate items. When drying ends, the ENERGY STAR® certified gas dryer's Wrinkle Shield™ Plus option with Steam helps release and prevent wrinkles. Color: Black Shadow.
